note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
This Repository is home to an example Dice Simulation for the Berry Clip Add on for the Raspberry Pi using the Pi4J library.

The BerryClip is available from [http://www.raspberrypi-spy.co.uk](http://www.raspberrypi-spy.co.uk/berryclip-6-led-add-on-board/berryclip-6-led-add-on-board-instructions/)/
name: Pi-berryclip
